sentences.en: Elinor, conning over every injunction of distrust, told herself likewise not to hope.
sentences.cn: 埃莉诺细细领会每一句叫她不抱信心的暗示, 同样告诫自己不要作过奢的指望.

sentences.en: Have you any distrust of my new method?
sentences.cn: 你对我的新办法有怀疑 吗 ?

sentences.en: He is devoting much of his energy to implanting an element of distrust in the community.
sentences.cn: 他竭力在社区内撒播猜疑的种子。

sentences.en: He looked at the stranger with distrust.
sentences.cn: 他怀疑地打量着那个陌生人.

sentences.en: Her constant lying led me to distrust everything she said.
sentences.cn: 她总撤谎,我完全不相信她的话了.

sentences.en: His duplicity caused us to distrust him.
sentences.cn: 他的口是心非使我们不相信他。

sentences.en: I don't lend money to people that I distrust.
sentences.cn: 我不把钱借给我信不过的人.

sentences.en: In his watery eyes there is an expression of distrust.
sentences.cn: 他那含泪的眼睛流露出惊惶失措的神情.

sentences.en: Local people regard the police with suspicion and distrust.
sentences.cn: 当地人对警察持怀疑、不信任的态度。

sentences.en: Not only did I distrust him, I didn't know how much I could safely say.
sentences.cn: 我不但信不过他, 而且也不知道该怎么说才稳当.

sentences.en: On the one hand I admire his gifts, but on the other I distrust his judgment.
sentences.cn: 一方面我羡慕他的才华, 而另一方面我却怀疑他的判断力.

sentences.en: She could not overcome her distrust of the stranger.
sentences.cn: 她无法消除对那位陌生人的怀疑.

sentences.en: She had every reason to distrust him.
sentences.cn: 她完全有理由不信任他。

sentences.en: She thought of what had just passed with anxiety and distrust.
sentences.cn: 她焦急,怀疑地想着刚刚发生过的事.

sentences.en: The child looked at the stranger with distrust.
sentences.cn: 那孩子用怀疑的目光望着陌生人.

sentences.en: The echoes of the hills awakened his distrust.
sentences.cn: 那隆隆的回音引起了他的警惕.

sentences.en: They looked at each other with distrust.
sentences.cn: 他们心怀戒备地相互看着对方。

words.tran_cn: 怀疑的；不信任的；可疑的

trans.tran_cn: 不信任，猜疑，疑惑，不相信
trans.tran_en: a feeling that you cannot trust someone
a feeling that you cannot trust someone
to not trust someone or something
